title: Talons e needs a higher in combat cd
body: its stupid the second you engage on him he jumps over 3 fucking walls because his e cd is so low, i get that the walls have cds but personally i think he should just get the one wall as his fast escape, getting into a bad spot with him is way too forgiving because he can hop wall after wall in rows, give it like a 5 sec cd between walls in combat

really, his E makes him the easiest assassin to play: exceptional burst, great poke, waveclear, free escape with no CC.. but ok.
"great poke" have you even played this champion? lmao

lmao his W hits twice has slow effect, is wide and has big range furthermore you can reposition to make it hit the second time lmao i wouldn't say he has no poke lmao compared to a fizz for instance at least lmao he has a ranged lmao poke lmao

I haven’t looked at the exact numbers in a while, but I’m pretty sure his w is ~600 range with a decent Cooldown. That is the same as some champions auto attack range, and much shorter than many other harass abilities in mid lane.

His all in is great and he can harass melee champions, but to say he has anything other than mediocre harass against ranged is a blatant lie.

I understand frustration against this ability but comparing Talon's mobility to other assassins he's far less mobile in combat already, and Riot even gave him low base movement speed so he wouldn't be fast in combat. The restriction of only being able to jump over walls makes it ways less easy to use than a LeBlanc W or Kass R, it's also a jump which allows people to still hit him while he's doing it. Because of these downsides he's allowed to potentially jump all over the map in record time yeah.

I guess the fact that he's probably the squishiest and the most ult reliant of all the assassins means nothing. Or how any type of CC that hits him is almost always a guarantee kill. Oh well. Let's complain some more, no?

Let's also forget that the walls he jump are on cooldown for at least 2 minutes, probably more. It's not like him jumping them has no consequence.

this topic show why lower elos shouldnt talk about balance.

When you want a change here, its  to kill the champion not balancing him. This isnt how riot should address their champ (they shouldnt gut their champ)

If Darius can land his e on him, talon is basically dead.
Most brusiers can kill assassins unless they are super fed.
talon top is just bad in general lol, and ya i never said you said he was op i was just throwing it out there that i dont think he is
